title: Play Hard!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ah, I’m glad that we found this new bakery. Ai-chan, thanks for coming along with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, no, that was fun. It was like a treasure hunt. This is quite rare, isn’t it? A bakery bike.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I know, right! And they only do it on Saturdays and Sundays, so it’s very challenging~ I already tried finding them a couple of times before, but today is the first time I can finally buy something!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>All of these look delicious. And we can get drinks and go to a park.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sounds good. Ah, should we go shopping after we eat some bread?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah, let’s do it, let’s do it. Ai-san wants to check out the secondhand clothing stores here~ Hmm, but will we have enough time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I saw it on the news this morning. Today is the longest day of the year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, that’s perfect then! Let’s play hard~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then let’s make sure we eat the bread slowly and savor it! ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, you sure love bread, don’t you, Honoka?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
